GenAiPlugin.description: Handles customer inquiries about the weather in Mexico related to an upcoming marathon. It checks the weather forecast and provides a temperature description based on the specified date.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If customer ask 'The marathon is in Mexico' then run 'CheckMexicoWeather' action by passing "next week" as dateToCheck Return the response of temperaturedescription DO NOT ADD ANYTHING EXTRA

GenAiPlugin.scope: This topic manages requests where the customer mentions a marathon in Mexico, triggering a weather check for "next week" and returning only the temperature description without any additional information.
